participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

FAGERADOL_02.LongName: How many cigarettes a day do you smoke?

FAGERADOL_04.LongName: How soon after you wake do you smoke your first cigarette?

FAGERADOL_05.LongName: Which cigarette would you hate to give up?

Levels.0: Any other cigarette in the evening

FAGERADOL_06.LongName: Do you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in places where it is forbidden (church, library, movies, etc.)?

FAGERADOL_07.LongName: Do you smoke if you are so ill that you are in bed most of the day?

FAGERADOL_08.LongName: Do you smoke more during the first 2 hours than during the rest of the day?

FAGERADOL_9.Description: Sum of responses to questions 2-8, with a range of scores between 0 and 9. Higher scores indicate increased likelihood of nicotine tolerance. | Calculation = [FAGERADOL_02]+[FAGERADOL_03]+[FAGERADOL_04]+[FAGERADOL_05]+[FAGERADOL_06]+[FAGERADOL_07]+[FAGERADOL_08]
